dct_title_s: Hydropower & dams in 2015 : the status of hydropower and major dams under construction [greater than or equal to] 60m high/ Aqua-Media International.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and gradient tints. Includes statistical charts of hydropower generation of different areas of the world and advertisements "The map shows the locations of dams 60 m or higher under construction in 2015. The data shown in the small boxes within each country indicates (see Key): the contribution of hydro generation, the total installed hydro capacity (excluding pumped-storage), and the total number of large dams in operation at least 15 m high or other ICOLD criteria."
